title: Renamed US Institute of Peace 'Trump Institute of Peace'
summary: December 3, 2025: State Department renamed congressionally-created U.S. Institute of Peace to 'Donald J. Trump Institute of Peace.' Trump's name added to building facade. State Dept tweet: 'renamed to reflect the greatest dealmaker in our nation's history.' Occurred while Trump administration was fighting Institute in court after federal judge ruled government's armed takeover was illegal. Administration had fired entire board and staff earlier in 2025. Rep. Steve Cohen condemned renaming. Critics noted hypocrisy of Trump name on peace institution while dismantling it.
